raijin.stringutils

This module contains a few additons to handling strings.

Author:
Paul Crane

pure @safe bool find(const string value, immutable string toFindValue, CaseSensitive cs = CaseSensitive.no);
Determines if a string has the value specified

Params:
string value The string to search.
string toFindValue The value to find.
CaseSensitive cs Set whether the search term is case sensitive. CaseSensitive.yes or CaseSensitive.no

Returns:
True if the toFindValue is found false otherwise.

string pluralize(string text, immutable uint count);
Pluralizes a string.

Params:
string text The word to pluralize.
uint count The number of words.

Returns:
The pluralized string if more than one of type or singular form otherwise.

@trusted string removeLeadingChars(string str, dchar charToRemove);
Removes the charactor from the beginning of a string.

Params:
string str The string to remove characters from.
dchar charToRemove The character to remove.

Returns:
The modified string with all characters to be removed are removed.
